title: Found some boosted animals in the wild
body:
hi i have found two summoners who i think has been boosted, not just from their gameplay, but from the performance chart in lolking.com.
I would like to submit tickets for these bonobos but I don't know how to. where do I submit tickets?

replies.body: Unfortunately Riot would rather ban shit talkers than cheaters.
you cant , riot does not  give a fuck
Unfortunately riot won't do much, Boosted players have excess money, and riot love people with excess money.

There's heaps of boosted animals in the wild on OCE server. I'd estimate about 20% of the server in fact. Dynamic queue has made it so. Will take about 6 months before peoples real ranks are back to normal.
